title: UpdateDatapointMetadataRequest
description: A request to update the metadata of a single datapoint.

id.description: The ID of the datapoint to update. Required.

DatapointMetadataUpdate.description: A request to update the metadata of a datapoint.

name.description: Datapoint name. If omitted, it will be left unchanged. If specified as `null`, it will be set to `null`. If specified as a value, it will be set to the provided value.
